## Test env 
### 1. local development
- Install `node.js` by nvm: [windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows), [linux/mac](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm)
- Use node `20.10.0`: `nvm use`
- Install the required files: `npm ci`
